EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud.Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for today's webinar Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud with Josh Long. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, April 21, 2015
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e0ddd151e79858224cb10b25a3bfc8878> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 661 933 304
Thank you,
